attributes.title: this app is horrible !

attributes.title: worst app ever!
attributes.review: This app is complete trash. I hate it. This app makes zero sense. Tik Tok is a WAY better app than this. Why is there a big picture of trump on this app. TERRIBLE.

attributes.title: What is this?
attributes.review: When I open the app, every single follicle of hair on my body fell off. I am now smoother than a new born baby. I am revolted.

Is the worst

attributes.title: i don’t support fascists
attributes.review: i downloaded and opened the app just to find out that it is an app about a misogynistic rapist, who is also a racist who also happens to be a fascist.. wow. i cannot believe the app store would have something so disgusting available to download. i am disappointed.

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: Unfortunately America has been cursed with a pig for a president so I took the liberty to rate the app a one star due to the fact that trump is a piece of trash:)

attributes.title: no thank you 😌

attributes.title: SAD!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to be able to show my grandkids the right way to sing GOD BLESS AMERICA and there are NOT any tutorials on here. The AUDACITY. PLEASE REMOVE FROM THE APP STORE! I thought this was my country too.
